item.title: The Art of Approach
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: A post hyperfocussing only on the element of approach, it’s impact and implications. Which role does approach play in day-to-day lifes? What significance does it have, and what difference does it make?
